title: 腾讯云比较
text: 本视频来自B站av7318398下面是七牛云var dplayer0 = new DPlayer({"element":document.getElementById("dplayer0"),"autoplay":0,"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":1,"video":{"url":"http://om50jwugm.bkt.clouddn.com/job_%E7%AB%A5%E8%AF%9D%E9%95%87MV","pic":"http://om50jwugm.bkt.clouddn.com/002.jpg"},"danmaku":{"api":"https://dplayer.daoapp.io/","id":"9E2E3368B56CDBB3","token":"tokendemo","addition":["https://dplayer.daoapp.io/bilibili?aid"]}}); 下面是腾讯云var dplayer1 = new DPlayer({"element":document.getElementById("dplayer1"),"autoplay":0,"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":1,"video":{"url":"http://cangku-1254107878.cossh.myqcloud.com/job_%E7%AB%A5%E8%AF%9D%E9%95%87MV.mp4","pic":"http://om50jwugm.bkt.clouddn.com/002.jpg"},"danmaku":{"api":"http://dplayer.donot.help/dplayerpy","id":"9E2E3368B56CDBB3","token":"tokendemo","addition":["http://dplayer.donot.help/dplayerpy/bilibili?aid"]}}); 原版var dplayer2 = new DPlayer({"element":document.getElementById("dplayer2"),"autoplay":0,"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":1,"video":{"url":"http://om50jwugm.bkt.clouddn.com/job_%E7%AB%A5%E8%AF%9D%E9%95%87MV","pic":"http://om50jwugm.bkt.clouddn.com/002.jpg"},"danmaku":{"api":"https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/","id":"9E2E3368B56CDBB3","token":"tokendemo","addition":["https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/bilibili?aid"]}}); var dplayer3 = new DPlayer({"element":document.getElementById("dplayer3"),"autoplay":0,"theme":"#FADFA3","loop":1,"video":{"url":"http://devtest.qiniudn.com/若能绽放光芒.mp4","pic":"http://devtest.qiniudn.com/若能绽放光芒.png"},"danmaku":{"api":"https://api.prprpr.me/dplayer/","id":"9E2E3368B56CDBB4","token":"tokendemo"}}); title: Hello World
text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post 1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
